variation.name: contextExplicitDimDomainMemberNotFound
variation.description: The explicit dimension has a qName which doesn't correspond to an element declaration in the DTS of the instance.

variation.name: emptyDimensionAndNotAllHypercube-1
variation.description: Test the content of an empty dimension. The dimension content is a QName. There is no schema defining a global element with the corresponding QName. The QName is iso4217:EUR.

variation.name: emptyDimensionAndNotAllHypercube-4
variation.description: Test the content of an empty dimension. The dimension content is a QName. There is no schema defining a global element with the corresponding QName. The QName is foo:foo.

variation.name: emptyDimensionAndNotAllHypercube-5
variation.description: Test the content of an empty dimension. The dimension content is a QName. There *is* a schema defining a global element with the corresponding QName, but the QName is not a domain member anywhere.
